marklogic.body: Hi, My brother Stan and I own Club Paris. I wanted to congratulate all the establishments chosen for "TheÂ Anchorage Burger Battle". I believe the ADN staff did a great job narrowing the field and picking some of the best offerings in the city. I do have two issues to address however.....one being the noticeable exception of The White Spot.....a storied contender with an incredible history. Secondly, Club Paris hamburger is ground in house daily.... but not from Top Sirloin. It is actually made from our Filet Mignon trimmings which are also carved on premise. Though I would have preferred the win.....I am proud to stand with the chosen few! Congratulations to one and all!!! Scott Selman
